template.description:
Ingests binary documents from database.
Process: get DB docs (docs stored in binary) -> OCR docs -> ingest free text along with doc metadata into ES.
template.name: OpenSearch_ingest_DB_to_ES_OCR

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: CAST(docid as VARCHAR) as docid, sampleid, dct, binarydoc
